FREE CONTACTLESS CURBSIDE PICKUP

How it works:

 Shop Online – Select Contactless Curbside Pickup as your shipping method during checkout.
 We’ll let you know when your order is ready via email or phone. (Typically within 2 hours) 
 Drive to the store between 10:00AM-6:00PM. (5pm for Boats & SUPs).
 Park in one of the numbered parking spots near the marked pickup door in the back of our south parking lot. (Boats & SUPS have a separate marked pickup area).
 STAY IN YOUR VEHICLE and call 1-207-439-9222, Ext 330.
 A KTP team member will confirm purchase via printed or digital receipt and Valid ID shown through vehicle window.
 Once confirmed, they will place your order in your vehicle's backseat or trunk. (On vehicle or trailer if a Boat or SUP*).
 For documentation and your protection we will record vehicle plate number and date/time of pickup.

Subject to product availability. If an item is available for in-store pickup, you will be presented with the option to do so when selecting your shipping method.

Most in-store pickup orders are available within 24 hours of placing your order. After placing your order, we will send you a confirmation email, followed by a second email or phone call when your order is ready for pick up.

Kittery Trading Post does not make any guarantee that your order will be available at any specific time. Kittery Trading Post will not have any liability for any order delays.

Kittery Trading Post is open with reduced operating hours: Monday through Sunday, 10am-6pm. (9-10am are designated hours for persons 60+ and customers with underlying medical conditions).

*Customer is 100% responsible for securing boats for transportation. Please note: All rack assembly by KTP staff has been temporarily discontinued. The customer is 100% responsible for installation.
